channel.title: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?
channel.description: Hello, Ive been wondering how much can my server take... and is there a way to test this ?, by like local flooding or what.. ide like to know what it takes for my server to eventually go "eek, toomuch," *death* haha so if anyone has any ideas go for it

item.title: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I suggest getting a bot system, or having a friend get a bot, to try and test how many people he can get to login before the server crashes, if you have a set connect for ips, just change that for a little bit, change to like… 5000, then see if you can get 2000 on before it crashes.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?

item.title: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Quite a few, I’d (personally) say about, 60ish, possibly, I mean 60 is a lot of people, it also depends on how stable the source is.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?

item.title: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?
item.dc:creator: @Xionation Xionation
item.description:
@Xionation wrote:

So 4gb 800hz RAM 3.0 ghz overclocked quadcore would hold how many?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?

item.title: How do i test how many players my computer/server can hold without crashing?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Xionation:

So am i right epic steve?

Yes. You’re right, the space on your hard drive doesn’t contribute hardly any, (if at all) to the amount of players you can hold. The main contributor is your systems RAM, your CPU and possibly your internet speed, (upload speed, possible, I’m not sure on this one).

Read full topic
